root.name: Castle of Dr. Brain
root.description: OverviewCastle of Dr. Brain is the first of the Dr. Brain series of puzzle/educational games. Designed by Corey Cole, this game is played from a first person perspective, as the player attempts to solve puzzles and navigate the castle, in hopes of becoming Dr. Brain's apprentice.The game features three levels of difficulty for players of varying skill levels.
